import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, Switch, Route, Router } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import time from "../../TimeFunctions"; import config from "../../Config/config"; import TimelineRoutes from "../../Routes/TimelineRoutes"; export default function TimelineLeft(){ const [uploadimage, setUploadImage] = useState(""); const [dataOnUser, setDataOnUser] = useState([]); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const [value, setValue] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const id = localStorage.getItem("email"); axios.post(`${config.backendUrl}getpost`, { email: id }).then((res) => { setDataOnUser(res.data); console.log(res.data); }); }, [value]); useEffect(() => { const id = localStorage.getItem("email"); axios.post(`${config.backendUrl}userdata`, { email: id }).then((res) => { setUserName(res.data.fname + " " + res.data.lname); }); }, []); return (
